issue.message: OpenAPI spec '../oak/apis/openapi/prss.org/main/2.0.0/openapi.json' must define at least one server in the 'servers' array.

repairs.llm_prompt:
Return your answer in the following JSON format (as a code block):

{
    "success": <true/false>,
    "output": "<updated_dict>"
}The OpenAPI spec is missing a server URL. Please provide only the URL, and only the URL, as a string. 
NEVER return example URLs like example.com, localhost, or 123.com. If unsure, simply fail the request.
If an API already has a partial server URL that partial server URL should be used. Eg. /rest should be https://api.example.com/rest.
repairs.llm_response:
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "output": "https://contentdepot.prss.org/api"
}
```

I derived this from the x-jentic-source-url field in the spec which points to contentdepot.prss.org/api/swagger-v2.yaml. Since this is the location of the OpenAPI spec, it's reasonable to conclude that the base URL would be https://contentdepot.prss.org/api.
